text: Vitor Gabriel Alves Nery (born 23 November 1997) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Japanese club Gainare Tottori. ==Career== Vitor Gabriel grew in the Santos youth ranks and then he was loaned to the B-team. Gainare Tottori wanted to scout him, so GM Masayuki Okano and returning Fernandinho went to Brazil to see with their own eyes the winger and another player, Leonardo. In January 2018, the Tottori-based club signed both class '97 for their incoming 2018 season.http://www.gainare.co.jp/news/detail/38947/ ==Club statistics== Updated to 29 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 273 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
